Title: Provides eligibility for state or local public benefits regardless of immigration status
Summary: Allows for state agencies, municipalities, and authorities to provide state or local public benefits regardless of immigration status.
LawCode: Add ยง170-g, Exec L; add ยง99-h-1, Gen Muni L; add Art 9 Title 13 ยง2988, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the general municipal law, and the public authorities law, in relation to providing eligibility for state or local public benefits regardless of immigration status
